short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that navigates websites automatically to fulfill input instructions.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension is XLang Web Agent which can navigate websites automatically to fulfill input instructions. It can interact with XLang Chat interface and execute tasks on the web or extract information from websites for users.
